definition: theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: This is the website for International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry.

sentences.english: In the article 50 Totally Free Lessons in Graphic Design Theory the TutsPlus family definitely delivers with a bevy of knowledge building lessons in theory
sentences.chinese: 50节图形设计免费课程将教授你大量的理论知识。

sentences.chinese: 目的探讨线性结构模型理论及其在医学中的应用。

sentences.chinese: 用碘量法测定的乙烯基含量与理论值相符。

sentences.english: So the personality theory's got to go.
sentences.chinese: 所以不该采用人格理论了。

sentences.english: This process will certainly open up broad prospects for theoretical innovation.
